radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormal lymphocytes accounting for approximately 2% and abnormal plasma cells occupying 0.37% of nucleated cells.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: In the most recent follow-up (July 2023), abnormal lymphocytes accounted for approximately 4.07%, and abnormal plasma cells occupied 0.10% of nucleated cells.

radiographic_examinations.findings: MPGN with suspected cryoglobulinemic renal damage.
Chronic axonal damage with massive perivascular infiltration of numerous mononuclear cells.
